title: Prevalence and socio-demographic factors associated with double and triple burden of malnutrition among mother-child pairs in India: Findings from a nationally representative survey (NFHS-5)
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Premkumar Ramasubramani, Yuvaraj Krishnamoorthy, Sathish Rajaa
